Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes the non-lingual communication methods of a patient.

Any code from the SNOMED CT UK NonLingualCommunication subset with subset original id 6201000000132.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
